trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> The grief-stricken Shetona senses you might understand his pain.
TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Melancholy.
TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the sack of coin to the Nexus Arcade shopkeep.
TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_TODO_02<tab>Present the grief-stricken Shetona with the bottle of Alexandrian wine.
TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_SADSHETONA05169_000_000<tab>I lost a close friend of mine in that raid on the city... I know it's a lot to ask, but would you mind helping me give him a proper send-off?

TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_SADSHETONA05169_000_001<tab>I saw you weren't wearing a regulator─figured you'd understand what I'm going through. It feels like everyone else has already forgotten all about him...

TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_SADSHETONA05169_000_002<tab>I'm planning on packing a bunch of his belongings and a bottle of his favorite vintage in a box, then burying the whole lot in the cemetery in Heritage Found.
TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_SADSHETONA05169_000_003<tab>If you're up to the task, I'd have you source a bottle of Alexandrian wine for me.
TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_SADSHETONA05169_000_004<tab>Your best bet is speaking to the owner of the Neon Stein. Once you've got the goods, come meet me by the entrance to the city.
TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_MELANCHOLY_000_010<tab>After a bottle of Alexandrian wine, are you? Afraid we don't serve that here.

TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_MELANCHOLY_000_011<tab>Not the sort of thing the regulars go for. Heard it's perfectly drinkable, though. White wine─made right here in Everkeep, if you can believe it. Anyway, never had cause to stock the stuff.
TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_MELANCHOLY_000_012<tab>How about trying your luck in the Nexus Arcade? Can get near enough anything there if you know who to ask.
TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_MELANCHOLY_000_013<tab>You might be able to pick up a bottle in the Nexus Arcade. If I were you I'd head there.
TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_ARCADESHOPLADY05169_000_020<tab>Alexandrian wine? Yes, we have several bottles in stock. I should warn you, it comes at a premium...
TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_ARCADESHOPLADY05169_000_021<tab>A pleasure doing business with you! Here.
TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_ARCADESHOPLADY05169_000_022<tab>If there's anything else I can help you with, don't hesitate to ask.
TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_SADSHETONA05169_000_030<tab>There you are. I've just about managed to gather up all of his belongings. Any luck finding the wine?
TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_SADSHETONA05169_000_031<tab>Appreciate you going to all that trouble. This was his favorite tipple...

TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_SADSHETONA05169_000_032<tab>Me and him, we came from completely different backgrounds, but none of that mattered. Thirty years ago, I was going through a rough patch─everything was changing right before my eyes─and he stuck with me through it all.

TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_SADSHETONA05169_000_033<tab>There was one thing we didn't agree on, though: regulators. He never gave up trying to make me wear one of the damn things. But when <var 1A 02 /var>I<var 1A 01 /var> die, I want to go naturally, you know─back to the land and all that.

TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_SADSHETONA05169_000_034<tab>In the end, getting killed over and over again during the attack whittled his soul stock down to zero. Look, if people want to keep on wearing their regulators, I won't try and stop them, but it just isn't for me.

TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_SADSHETONA05169_000_035<tab>As it stands, I'm pretty much the only one left who remembers the poor bastard. I may get the funeral rites wrong─I mean, I'm sure his kind have their own way of doing things─but he'll just have to make do.
TEXT_KINGZG006_05169_SADSHETONA05169_000_036<tab>Anyway, I'm off to Heritage Found. Thanks again for helping me out. I owe you one.
